description:
cmd/ld: increase number of ELF sections

On NetBSD a cgo enabled binary has more than 32 sections - bump NSECTS
so that we can actually link them successfully.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=89b7039edf22 ***

cmd/ld: increase number of ELF sections

On NetBSD a cgo enabled binary has more than 32 sections - bump NSECTS
so that we can actually link them successfully.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6261052

On 2012/05/30 16:40:20, rsc wrote:
> LGTM
> 
> How about 48?

That is sufficient - done.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 6261052: cmd/ld: increase number of ELF sections
